page.title: 18Rugby and Soccer in Swansea
page.content: Two major features of sport in Swansea are rugby and soccer. {Swansea RFC}is known as the{'All {Whites'}because of its kit. It plays at St.Helens ground. It is considered one of the major teams in Wales. It has won the major Welsh rugby team prize as well as providing players for the national XV. The{soccer team}is known as the {'Swans'.} It is not as lucky as the rugby team. It has lost a lot of support in its slide from the 1st to 3rd divisions. It looks as if it will not be playing at the beginning of next season because of financial difficulties. This is a great pity since it is one of only 4 Welsh teams in the Football League and it is a side which has produced great players.
